statements: SELECT * FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_amount FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE coverage_type = 'Health';
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_start_date FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT coverage_type, coverage_start_date, coverage_end_date FROM policy_coverage_details ORDER BY coverage_start_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE coverage_amount BETWEEN 2000 AND 5000;
SELECT * FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE policy_holder_name = 'Alice'
SELECT policy_id, coverage_type, coverage_amount FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE coverage_amount > 1000
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_start_date, coverage_end_date FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE coverage_start_date >= '2023-01-01' AND coverage_end_date <= '2023-12-31'
SELECT AVG(coverage_amount) AS avg_coverage_amount, MAX(coverage_amount) AS max_coverage_amount FROM policy_coverage_details
SELECT * FROM policy_coverage_details ORDER BY coverage_start_date DESC, coverage_end_date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM policy_coverage_details;
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE coverage_type='Life';
SELECT policy_id, coverage_amount FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT update_id, update_date, update_description FROM policy_updates ORDER BY update_date DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_type FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE policy_holder_name='Alice' AND coverage_type='Health';
SELECT * FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_amount FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE coverage_type = 'Life Insurance';
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_type, coverage_amount FROM policy_coverage_details WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;

SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_type, update_date FROM policy_coverage_details JOIN policy_updates ON policy_coverage_details.policy_id = policy_updates.policy_id WHERE policy_updates.update_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT COUNT(policy_id) AS total_policies, SUM(coverage_amount) AS total_coverage_amount FROM policy_coverage_details;
SELECT * FROM PolicyCoverageDetails ORDER BY coverage_amount DESC;
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_type FROM PolicyCoverageDetails WHERE coverage_type = 'Health Insurance';
SELECT policy_id, policy_holder_name, coverage_type, coverage_amount FROM PolicyCoverageDetails WHERE coverage_amount > 5000 ORDER BY coverage_type ASC;
SELECT * FROM PolicyHolders WHERE date_of_birth > '1990-01-01' ORDER BY policy_holder_name ASC;
SELECT payment_id, policy_id, amount FROM PolicyPayments WHERE payment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM PolicyCoverageDetails;
SELECT policy_holder_name, coverage_type FROM PolicyHolders WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT MAX(coverage_amount) AS max_coverage_amount, MIN(coverage_amount) AS min_coverage_amount FROM PolicyCoverageDetails;
SELECT policy_holder_name, SUM(amount) AS total_payments FROM PolicyHolders JOIN PolicyPayments ON PolicyHolders.policy_holder_id = PolicyPayments.policy_id GROUP BY policy_holder_name;

SELECT policy_holder_name, COUNT(payment_id) AS total_payments FROM PolicyHolders LEFT JOIN PolicyPayments ON PolicyHolders.policy_holder_id = PolicyPayments.policy_id GROUP BY policy_holder_name HAVING COUNT(payment_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM Policy WHERE policy_id = 1;
SELECT policy_name, coverage_amount FROM Policy WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT holder_name, holder_email FROM PolicyHolder WHERE holder_id = 1;
SELECT coverage_type, description FROM CoverageDetails WHERE coverage_id = 1;
SELECT policy_id, premium_amount, payment_date FROM PremiumDetails WHERE premium_amount < 1000;
SELECT policy_name, coverage_amount FROM Policy WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT policy_name, end_date FROM Policy WHERE policy_type = 'Life';
SELECT holder_name, holder_email FROM PolicyHolder WHERE holder_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT policy_name, coverage_type FROM Policy p JOIN CoverageDetails c ON p.policy_id = c.policy_id;
SELECT policy_name, premium_amount FROM Policy p JOIN PremiumDetails pd ON p.policy_id = pd.policy_id WHERE pd.payment_date < '2022-06-01';
SELECT * FROM PolicyHolders;
SELECT first_name, last_name, address FROM PolicyHolders;
SELECT policy_id, policy_type, coverage_amount FROM PolicyDetails WHERE coverage_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM PolicyAgents ORDER BY agent_name DESC;
SELECT agent_id, contact_number FROM PolicyAgents WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT * FROM PolicyHolders;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM PolicyHolders ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name DESC;
SELECT policy_type, coverage_amount FROM PolicyDetails WHERE coverage_amount > 1000;
SELECT DISTINCT agent_name, contact_number FROM PolicyAgents;
SELECT policy_id, SUM(claim_amount) AS total_claim_amount FROM PolicyClaims GROUP BY policy_id ORDER BY total_claim_amount DESC;
